subject: FW: Requirement of Quotation of Bins
body:

Please expedite on the trail mail request.
Prepare 2 different quotations, One for Ranjangaon & One for Ahmednagar.

Thanks & Regards
Uddhav Shinde,

Subject: Requirement of Quotation of Bins
